title: Power cuts reimposed from today (2)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Electricity Board states that power cuts will be imposed from today (2) onwards.
Power cuts remained suspended due to the G.C.E. Ordinary Level Examinations, which ended on 1st of June.
Accordingly, the Public Utilities Commission announced that power cuts will be imposed today (2) and tomorrow (3), for one hour at night and one hour during the day.
On Saturday (4), power cuts will be imposed only for an hour, while no power cuts will be imposed on 5th Sunday.
Rs. 645 Million paid by Pharmaceutical Corp. for a software that doesn’t work
